div1.p: United States District Court Western District of Washington Northern Divsion.
In the Matter of the Application of Maria Miler for a Writ of Habeas Corpus. } No. 2457 Order.
On application of the attorneys for Petitioner and Respondent herein;

It is Hereby Ordered, That the Attorney for the Petitioner, may, by giving proper receipt to the Clerk of this Court, receive from said Clerk the original Return herein, said attorney to safely keep the same and return to the Clerk and to the files of this Court on demand of the Clerk, and within five days.
In the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington GOB-4-108
In the Matter of the Application of Maria Miler for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.

Filed in the U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington.
Apr 21 1913
Frank L Crosby, Clerk.
By EML Deputy.
